title: A Thousand Words
description: What happened with Matt and Lydia in When the City Sleeps and what about Quin, Sawyer's brother? Are Miranda and Derek married? Who is having children and what are their names? What's going on behind the scenes? Find out about all of your favorite characters (friends, right?) in this extra special addition to the Unspoken Series. Each main character tells their story in 1000 words on the mark. This full-color book is filled with recipes, photos, and other fun stuff from the Unspoken Series that you're sure to love! This book is NOT a stand-alone and should be read between Book 6 and Book 8.
author: Marilyn Grey
